********************************** Readme **********************************

Compliance test bit streams and decoded PCM files generated by

Marco Stanzani/Giorgio Parladori		     gparladori@tlt.alcatel.it
Alcatel TELECOM                         	     phone: +39-39-686.4977
Via Trento,30 I-20059 VIMERCATE (MI) - Italy   	     fax:   +39-39-686.3587
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Test signal "Test01"
	"Test01" means the 1st item in the paper which title is
	"Schedule of activities for MPEG-2 Audio Compliance".


Files:	test01.mpg	(encoded base bitstream)
	test01_c.pcm	(decoded pcm file, center channel)
	test01_l.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left channel)
	test01_ls.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left surround channel)
	test01_r.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right channel)
	test01_rs.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right surround channel)
	test01_lfe.pcm 	(decoded pcm file, low frequency enhancement channel)

Description:
	matrix					3
	extension				-
	transmission channel allocation		-
	phantom center				no
	prediction				no
	dynamic cross talk			no
	sampling freq.				44.1 kHz
	LFE					yes
	multilingual				no
	ancillary data				no
	bitrate base stream			384 kbps
	bitrate extension stream		-
	configuration				3/2
